lead_paragraph: President Trump called former President Barack Obama a “bad (or sick) guy” as he leveled an explosive claim about election-season wiretapping.
snippet: President Trump called former President Barack Obama a “bad (or sick) guy” as he leveled an explosive claim about election-season wiretapping....

headline.main: Trump, Offering No Evidence, Says Obama Tapped His Phones
headline.print_headline: With No Proof,Trump Claims Obama Tapped
